help.mp:
:crossed_swords: Hey! This message was sent because you asked for help.

If you need help, you can join the bot server!

You will be able to be a part of the bot's development and you will get details about it!

https://discord.gg/USnCxg4

If you don't want to join us (:sob:) you can also read the bot's wiki!
https://draftbot.fandom.com/fr/wiki/Commandes
help.main:
here is the list of the available commands:**

```
respawn
ping
profile
report
switch
shop
sell
top
topWeek
topServ
inventory
fight
daily
drink
prefix
language
guildCreate
guildLeave
guildKick
guildAdd
guild
guildDaily
```
:arrow_forward: If you want more information about a specific command write: `help [name of the command]` :wink:

:arrow_forward: You can ask for help about badges by writing `help badges`

:arrow_forward: For more help you can visit the bot's wiki! https://draftbot.fandom.com/fr/wiki/Commandes

commands.prefix:
:interrobang: `prefix {New prefix}` :

Allows you, if you are admin of a server, to change the prefix used by the bot on this server.
commands.ping:
:ping_pong: `ping`:

Check if the bot is online.

(Note: Time displayed is the response time from the bot, not your ping, a correct ping should be less than 500 ms. :clock1:):
commands.respawn:
:angel: `respawn`

Lets you continue playing after dying.
commands.profile:
:bust_in_silhouette: `profile`

Your character's information:

:smiley: Status effects | Nickname | Level :star: XP | :heart: Health | :dagger: Attack | :shield: Armor | :rocket: Speed | :blue_heart: Fight points | :trophy: Ranking | :moneybag: Money | :medal: Points

Badges are displayed using reactions.
commands.switch:
:repeat: `switch`

Switches the item currently in use with the one in your inventory.
commands.fight:
:crossed_swords: `fight`

Use this command to duel other players on the same server as you.
commands.language:
:flag_fr: `language` 

 Change the language the bot use to french. You can use this command if you are admin of a server.
commands.top:
:trophy: `top [page number]`

Displays the general ranking of the game in 15 player intervals. Players in the same server as you are shown by a blue dot.
commands.topWeek:
:trophy: `topWeek [page number]`

Displays the general weekly ranking of the game in pages of 15 players. Players in the same server as you are shown with a blue dot.
commands.topServ:
:trophy: `topServ [page number]`

Displays this server's ranking of the game in pages of 15 players.
commands.inventory:
:school_satchel: `inventory`

Shows the items in your inventory, can contain 4 types of objects:
```
-Weapons
-Armors
-Potions
-Items
```
The command also shows the reserve that can contain another type of item temporarily during the time you deliberate whether or not to keep it.

:warning: **The reserve is not to be trusted if you want to keep anything precious**
The items kept in here can be replaced whenever you find a new one.
commands.report:
:newspaper: `report`

Lets you obtain the resources and intel your character got during your absence.
From time to time, events will be triggered and will necessitate special actions or choices.
commands.sell:
:moneybag: `sell`

Lets you sell the item currently in your reserve. The value of the item is set to be equal to its power, it can be 0 if the item is not very good :wink:.
commands.daily:
:calendar: `daily`

Some items give you bonuses daily or monthly. Use this command to obtain said bonuses. You can learn whether or not an item gives you a bonus by using the command `inventory`.
commands.invite:
:inbox_tray: `invite`

This command allows you to get an invite url to get the bot on your server, or join the support server!
commands.badge:
:military_medal: `badges`

Badges are rewards very hard to get created to honor people who helped the bot development. The list of available badges is diplayed on the bot's discord server. (you can have the link of the server using the `invite` command)
commands.badges:
:military_medal: `badges`

Badges are very difficult distinctions to obtain and have been created to reward people who have most supported the development of the bot. The list of available badges is diplayed on the bot's discord server. (you can have the link of the server using the `invite` command)
commands.drink:
:tropical_drink: `drink`

This command allows you to drink the potion you have. Some potions cannot be drunk and are consumed automatically during a fight.
commands.shop:
:shopping_cart: `shop`

This command allows you to spend your money to facilitate your adventure. Besides the 4 main choices which are always available, you can buy an exclusive potion every day, available on sale for only 24h.
commands.guild:
:stadium: `guild [nom de guilde ou mention]`

Displays a guild's infos.
commands.guildKick:
:leg: `guildKick`

Kicks a member. Requires to be the guild's leader.
commands.guildAdd:
:incoming_envelope: `guildAdd [mention]`

Invites someone to join your guild. Requires to be the guild's leader.

events.0:
: ** :mailbox_with_mail: **Welcome!** :crown: The king searches for a mighty knight to marry his daughter and **you** have been chosen to be part of the selection contest! I'll be your partner for this journey, and I'll do my best to help you triumph!
:triangular_flag_on_post: Our goal for this game is to collect as many points as we can, to show the king our might!:muscle: I'll explain how it works...
:notebook_with_decorative_cover: Of course, I won't make a long and monotonous speech, so if you want more details, please use `!help`
So, let's start! It's pretty simple, I'll do whatever you ask! I'm going to collect resources :moneybag: for you while you're gone, and you'll just have to use `!report` to get them. If I ever have problems, I'll ask you what to do and you'll help me continue!
